function.name: get_discharge_eligible_documents
function.description: Find all documents that are eligible for discharge based on the 30-day AFV rule. Returns documents where AFV notation is present and at least 30 days have passed since issuance date. Optionally filter by beneficiary.

beneficiary_id.description: Optional UUID to filter discharge-eligible documents for a specific beneficiary

returns.description: Array of documents eligible for discharge, sorted by discharge date (earliest first)
